by.tc.auction.service.user_operation

Interface ProfileService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProfileServiceImpl

    public interface ProfileService
    An interface of operations on users profiles. An interface provides methods for operations on users profiles in an application logic and in a source.
    Author:
    semenovich

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean editUserInfo(User user)
      Edits user profile info.
      AuctionsInfo getUserAuctionParticipations(java.lang.String login, int page)
      Returns a list of user auction participations portion.

      Returns a list of user lots portion.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserInfo

        User getUserInfo(java.lang.String login)
          throws ServiceException
        Returns user profile info. In the method the same DAO method should be used.
        Parameters:
        login - - a user login.
        Returns:
        A user if a user exists. null if a user doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • getUserLots

        LotsInfo getUserLots(java.lang.String login,
                     int page)
              throws ServiceException
        Returns a list of user lots portion. In the method the same DAO method should be used.
        Parameters:
        login - - a user login.
        page - - a page of a lots list.
        Returns:
        A list of user lots portion. Empty list if such lots don't exist. null if a user doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • getUserWinLots

        LotsInfo getUserWinLots(java.lang.String login,
                        int page)
                 throws ServiceException
        Returns a list of user win lots portion. In the method the same DAO method should be used.
        Parameters:
        login - - a user login.
        page - - a page of a lots list.
        Returns:
        A list of user win lots portion. Empty list if such lots don't exist. null if a user doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • getUserAuctionParticipations

        AuctionsInfo getUserAuctionParticipations(java.lang.String login,
                                          int page)
                                   throws ServiceException
        Returns a list of user auction participations portion. In the method the same DAO method should be used.
        Parameters:
        login - - a user login.
        page - - a page of an auctions list.
        Returns:
        A list of user auction participations. Empty list if such auctions don't exist. null if a user doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • editUserInfo

        boolean editUserInfo(User user)
              throws ServiceException,
                     UserInfoException
        Edits user profile info. In the method the same DAO method should be used.
        Parameters:
        user - - user updated info.
        Returns:
        true if user profile info has been edited. false if user profile info hasn't been edited.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation.
        UserInfoException - - if user info is incorrect.

      • uploadUserImage

        boolean uploadUserImage(java.lang.String userLogin,
                        java.lang.String imagePath)
                 throws ServiceException
        Uploads a user profile image. In the method the same DAO method should be used.
        Parameters:
        userLogin - - a user login.
        imagePath - - an image path.
        Returns:
        true if a user profile image has been uploaded. false if a user profile image hasn't been uploaded.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation.
